operator.name: OperatorChain
operator.description: A chain of operators that is subsequently applied.

operator.name: ModelApplier
operator.description: Applies a model to an example set. This might be a prediction or another data transformation model.

operator.name: ModelUpdater
operator.description: Updates a model according to an example set. Please note that this operator can only be used for updatable models, otherwise an error will be shown.

operator.name: ModelGrouper
operator.description: Groups the input models into a single combined model which might be necessary for example for applying preprocessing models.

operator.name: ModelUngrouper
operator.description: Ungroups a previously grouped model into the single models which might then be handled on their own.

operator.name: Process
operator.description: The root operator chain, which needs to be the outer most operator of any process.

operator.name: Experiment
operator.description: The root operator chain, which needs to be the outer most operator of any experiment.

operator.name: MemoryCleanUp
operator.description: Frees unused memory. Might be useful after large preprocessing chains with a lot of (now) unused views or even data copies. Can be very useful after the data set was (again) materialized in memory.

operator.name: MaterializeDataInMemory
operator.description: Creates a fresh and clean copy of the data. Might be useful after large preprocessing chains with a lot of views or even data copies, especially in combination with a memory clean up operation followed afterwards.

operator.name: IOConsumer
operator.description: This operators simply consumes some unused outputs.

operator.name: IOMultiplier
operator.description: This operators simply multiplies selected input objects.

operator.name: IOSelector
operator.description: This operators simply selects one of the input objects of the specified type and brings it to the front so that following operators will work on this object.

operator.name: IOStorer
operator.description: This operators stores one of the input objects of the specified type into the process object storage.

operator.name: IORetriever
operator.description: This operators retrieves an objects of the specified type which was previously stored into the process object storage.

operator.name: CommandLineOperator
operator.description: This operator simply executes a command in a shell of the underlying operating system, basically any system command or external program.

operator.name: MacroDefinition
operator.description: This operator can be used to define arbitrary macros which can be used by %{my_macro} in parameter values.

operator.name: SingleMacroDefinition
operator.description: This operator can be used to define a single arbitrary macro which can be used by %{my_macro} in parameter values.

operator.name: DataMacroDefinition
operator.description: This operator can be used to define a single macro which can be used by %{my_macro} in parameter values. The macro value will be derived from the input data.

operator.name: MacroConstruction
operator.description: This operator can be used to calculate new macros (from existing ones).

operator.name: FileEcho
operator.description: This operator simply writes the given text into the specified file (can be useful in combination with a process branch).

operator.name: SQLExecution
operator.description: This operator simply performs an arbitrary SQL statement.

operator.name: Script
operator.description: This operator executes arbitrary Groovy scripts.

operator.name: PerformanceEvaluator
operator.description: A performance evaluator delivers as output a list of performance values according to a list of performance criteria.
operator.deprecation: Please use the operators BasicPerformance, RegressionPerformance, ClassificationPerformance, or BinominalClassificationPerformance instead.

operator.name: CostEvaluator
operator.description: A cost evaluator delivers as output the costs for given classification results.

operator.name: Data2Performance
operator.description: This operator can be used to directly derive a performance measure from a specific data or statistics value.

operator.name: Performance
operator.description: This operator delivers as output a list of performance values automatically determined in order to fit the learning task type.

operator.name: RegressionPerformance
operator.description: This operator delivers as output a list of performance values according to a list of selected performance criteria (for regression tasks).

operator.name: ClassificationPerformance
operator.description: This operator delivers as output a list of performance values according to a list of selected performance criteria (for all classification tasks).

operator.name: BinominalClassificationPerformance
operator.description: This operator delivers as output a list of performance values according to a list of selected performance criteria (for binominal classification tasks).

operator.name: ForecastingPerformance
operator.description: This operator delivers as output a list of performance values according to a list of selected performance criteria (for forecasting regression tasks).

operator.name: UserBasedPerformance
operator.description: This operator delivers as output a list of performance values according to a list of user defined performance criteria.

operator.name: AttributeCounter
operator.description: This operator created a performance vector containing the number of features of the input example set.

operator.name: SupportVectorCounter
operator.description: This operator created a performance vector containing the number of support vectors of the input kernel model.

operator.name: WeightedPerformanceCreator
operator.description: Returns a performance vector containing the weighted fitness value of the input criteria.

operator.name: MinMaxWrapper
operator.description: Puts all input criteria into a min-max criterion which delivers the minimum instead of the average or arbitrary weighted combinations.

operator.name: XValidation
operator.description: XValidation encapsulates a cross-validation in order to estimate the performance of a learning operator.

operator.name: BatchXValidation
operator.description: A batched cross-validation in order to estimate the performance of a learning operator according to predefined example batches.

operator.name: BootstrappingValidation
operator.description: This operator encapsulates an iterated bootstrapping sampling with performance evaluation on the remaining examples.

operator.name: WeightedBootstrappingValidation
operator.description: This operator encapsulates an iterated weighted bootstrapping sampling with performance evaluation on the remaining examples.

operator.name: SimpleValidation
operator.description: A SimpleValidation randomly splits up the example set into a training and test set and evaluates the model.

operator.name: FixedSplitValidation
operator.description: A FixedSplitValidation splits up the example set at a fixed point into a training and test set and evaluates the model.

operator.name: SlidingWindowValidation
operator.description: SlidingWindoValidation encapsulates sliding windows of training and tests in order to estimate the performance of a prediction operator.

operator.name: BatchSlidingWindowValidation
operator.description: Performs a sliding window validation on predefined example batches.

operator.name: WrapperXValidation
operator.description: Encapsulates a cross-validation to evaluate a feature weighting or selection method (wrapper).

operator.name: SimpleWrapperValidation
operator.description: A simple validation method to check the performance of a feature weighting or selection wrapper.

operator.name: IteratingPerformanceAverage
operator.description: Iterates the inner operators and builds the average of the results.

operator.name: CFSFeatureSetEvaluator
operator.description: Calculates a performance measure based on the Correlation (filter evaluation).

operator.name: ConsistencyFeatureSetEvaluator
operator.description: Calculates a performance measure based on the consistency (filter evaluation).

operator.name: T-Test
operator.description: Performs a t-test to determine the probability for the null hypothesis 'the actual means are the same'.

operator.name: Anova
operator.description: Performs ANalysis Of VAriances to determine the probability for the null hypothesis 'the actual means are the same'.

operator.name: ClusterDensityEvaluator
operator.description: Delivers a performance based on cluster densities.

operator.name: ClusterCentroidEvaluator
operator.description: Delivers a performance based on cluster centroids.

operator.name: ClusterNumberEvaluator
operator.description: Delivers a performance based on the number of clusters.

operator.name: ItemDistributionEvaluator
operator.description: Delivers a performance of a cluster model based on the distribution of examples.

operator.name: AttributeConstructionsWriter
operator.description: Writes all attributes of an example set to a file. Each line holds the construction description of one attribute.

operator.name: AttributeConstructionsLoader
operator.description: Loads all attributes of an example set from a file. Each line holds the construction description of one attribute.

operator.name: AttributeWeightsWriter
operator.description: Writes the weights of all attributes of an example set to a file. Each line holds the name and the weight of one attribute.

operator.name: AttributeWeightsLoader
operator.description: Reads the weights of all attributes of an example set from a file. Each line must hold the name and the weight of one attribute.

operator.name: AccessExampleSource
operator.description: This operator reads an example set from an Access database.

operator.name: DatabaseExampleSource
operator.description: This operator reads an example set from an SQL database.

operator.name: CachedDatabaseExampleSource
operator.description: This operator reads an example set from an SQL database by incrementally caching it (recommended).

operator.name: SimpleExampleSource
operator.description: This operator reads an example set from file. It is a simpler version of the ExampleSource operator.

operator.name: URLExampleSource
operator.description: This operator reads an example set from a URL. It allows only a fixed data format but on the other hand is able to read data from arbitrary sources.

operator.name: ExampleSource
operator.description: This operator reads an example set from file. The operator can be configured to read almost all file formats.

operator.name: ExcelExampleSource
operator.description: This operator reads an example set from Excel spreadsheet files.

operator.name: ExcelExampleSetWriter
operator.description: This operator writes an example set to Excel spreadsheet files.

operator.name: ExampleSetWriter
operator.description: Writes the values of all examples to a file.

operator.name: DatabaseExampleSetWriter
operator.description: Writes the values of all examples to a single table in a database.

operator.name: ArffExampleSetWriter
operator.description: Writes the values of all examples into an ARFF-file.

operator.name: XrffExampleSetWriter
operator.description: Writes the values of all examples into an XRFF-file.

operator.name: GnuplotWriter
operator.description: Creates gnuplot files from the data generated by a process log operator.

operator.name: ArffExampleSource
operator.description: This operator can read arff files.

operator.name: XrffExampleSource
operator.description: This operator can read xrff files.

operator.name: CSVExampleSource
operator.description: This operator can read csv files.

operator.name: CSVExampleSetWriter
operator.description: This operator can write csv files.

operator.name: DBaseExampleSource
operator.description: This operator can read dBase files.

operator.name: BibtexExampleSource
operator.description: This operator can read BibTeX files.

operator.name: C45ExampleSource
operator.description: This operator can read data and meta given in C4.5 format.

operator.name: DasyLabExampleSource
operator.description: This operator can read DasyLab data files.

operator.name: SPSSExampleSource
operator.description: This operator can read SPSS data files.

operator.name: StataExampleSource
operator.description: This operator can read Stata data files.

operator.name: SparseFormatExampleSource
operator.description: Reads an example file in sparse format.

operator.name: ModelLoader
operator.description: Reads a model from a given file.

operator.name: ModelWriter
operator.description: Writes a model to a given file.

operator.name: WekaModelLoader
operator.description: Reads a Weka model from a given file.

operator.name: ParameterSetLoader
operator.description: Reads a parameter set from a file.

operator.name: ParameterSetWriter
operator.description: Writes a parameter set into a file.

operator.name: ThresholdLoader
operator.description: Loads a threshold from a file (used for transforming soft into crisp predictions).

operator.name: ThresholdWriter
operator.description: Writes a threshold to a file (used for transforming soft into crisp predictions).

operator.name: IOContainerWriter
operator.description: Writes all current IO objects to a file.

operator.name: IOContainerReader
operator.description: Reads an IOContainer from a file.

operator.name: IOObjectWriter
operator.description: Generic writer for all types of IOObjects.

operator.name: IOObjectReader
operator.description: Generic reader for all types of IOObjects.

operator.name: ResultWriter
operator.description: This operator can be used at each point in an operator chain and and writes current results to the console or to a file.

operator.name: PerformanceWriter
operator.description: This operator can be used to write the input performance into a file.

operator.name: PerformanceLoader
operator.description: This operator can be used to load a performance vector from a file.

operator.name: ClusterModelWriter
operator.description: Writes a cluster model to a file.

operator.name: ClusterModelReader
operator.description: Reads a single cluster model from a file.

operator.name: Binary2MultiClassLearner
operator.description: Builds a classification model for multiple classes based on a binary learner.

operator.name: RelativeRegression
operator.description: Learns a regression model for predictions relative to another attribute value.

operator.name: MetaCost
operator.description: Builds a classification model using cost values from a given matrix.

operator.name: CostBasedThresholdLearner
operator.description: Determines confidence thresholds based on misclassification costs, also possible to define costs for the option non-classified.

operator.name: NaiveBayes
operator.description: Returns classification model using estimated normal distributions.

operator.name: KernelNaiveBayes
operator.description: Returns classification model using estimated kernel densities.

operator.name: AttributeBasedVote
operator.description: Actually no learning scheme since the prediction is the average of all attribute values.

operator.name: NearestNeighbors
operator.description: Classification with k-NN based on an explicit similarity measure.

operator.name: Perceptron
operator.description: Single Perceptron finding seperating hyperplane if one exists

operator.name: LinearRegression
operator.description: Linear regression.

operator.name: VectorLinearRegression
operator.description: Vector linear regression.

operator.name: FastLargeMargin
operator.description: A fast learning method for large margin optimizations.

operator.name: PolynomialRegression
operator.description: Polynomial regression.

operator.name: AdditiveRegression
operator.description: Additive regression operator allowing all learners (not restricted to Weka learners).

operator.name: Bagging
operator.description: Bagging operator allowing all learners (not restricted to Weka learners).

operator.name: Stacking
operator.description: Uses the first inner learner to build a stacked model on top of the predictions of the other inner learners.

operator.name: Vote
operator.description: Uses a majority vote (for classification) or the average (for regression) on top of the predictions of the other inner learners.

operator.name: BayesianBoosting
operator.description: Boosting operator based on Bayes' theorem.

operator.name: SubgroupDiscovery
operator.description: A Subgroup Discovery meta learning scheme

operator.name: ExhaustiveSubgroupDiscovery
operator.description: Performs an exhaustive subgroup discovery.

operator.name: IteratingGSS
operator.description: Combines Generic Sequential Sampling by Scheffer/Wrobel with Knowledge-Based Sampling by Scholz.
operator.deprecation: This operator will not be supported in future releases

operator.name: AdaBoost
operator.description: Boosting operator allowing all learners (not restricted to Weka learners).

operator.name: BestRuleInduction
operator.description: Returns a best conjunctive rule with respect to the WRAcc metric for boolean prediction problems and polynomial attributes.

operator.name: MultiCriterionDecisionStump
operator.description: A quick DecisionStump clone that allows to specify different utility functions.

operator.name: NeuralNet
operator.description: Learns a neural net from the input data.

operator.name: NeuralNetSimple
operator.description: Learns a neural net from the input data.

operator.name: NeuralNetImproved
operator.description: Learns a neural net from the input data.

operator.name: DefaultLearner
operator.description: Learns a default value.

operator.name: TransformedRegression
operator.description: This learner performs regression by transforming the labels and calling an inner regression learner.

operator.name: ClassificationByRegression
operator.description: This operator chain must contain a regression learner and allows to learn classifications tasks with more than two classes.

operator.name: JMySVMLearner
operator.description: JMySVMLearner provides an internal Java implementation of the mySVM by Stefan Rueping.

operator.name: MyKLRLearner
operator.description: MyKLRLearner provides an internal Java implementation of the myKLR by Stefan Rueping.

operator.name: LibSVMLearner
operator.description: LibSVMLearner encapsulates the Java libsvm, an SVM learner.

operator.name: EvoSVM
operator.description: EvoSVM uses an Evolutionary Strategy for optimization.

operator.name: HyperHyper
operator.description: This is a minimal SVM implementation. The model is built with only one positive and one negative example. Typically this operater is used in combination with a boosting method.

operator.name: LogisticRegression
operator.description: A logistic regression learner for binary classification tasks.

operator.name: LinearDiscriminantAnalysis
operator.description: A linear discriminant function for binominal labels and numerical attributes.

operator.name: QuadraticDiscriminantAnalysis
operator.description: A quadratic discriminant function for binominal labels and numerical attributes.

operator.name: RegularizedDiscriminantAnalysis
operator.description: A regularized generale discriminant function for binominal labels and numerical attributes.

operator.name: KernelLogisticRegression
operator.description: A kernel logistic regression learner for binary classification tasks.

operator.name: PsoSVM
operator.description: PsoSVM uses a Particle Swarm Optimization for optimization.

operator.name: RVMLearner
operator.description: An implementation of a relevance vector machine.

operator.name: GPLearner
operator.description: An implementation of Gaussian Processes.

operator.name: DecisionStump
operator.description: Learns only a root node of a decision tree. Can be very efficient when boosted.

operator.name: ID3
operator.description: Learns an unpruned decision tree from nominal attributes only.

operator.name: ID3Numerical
operator.description: Learns an unpruned decision tree from nominal and numerical data.

operator.name: DecisionTree
operator.description: Learns a pruned decision tree which can handle both numerical and nominal attributes.

operator.name: CHAID
operator.description: Learns a pruned decision tree based on a chi squared attribute relevance test.

operator.name: RelevanceTree
operator.description: Learns a pruned decision tree based on an arbitrary feature relevance test (attribute weighting scheme as inner operator).

operator.name: RandomTree
operator.description: Learns a single decision tree. For each split only a random subset of attributes is available.

operator.name: RandomForest
operator.description: Learns a set of random trees, i.e. for each split only a random subset of attributes is available. The resulting model is a voting model of all trees.

operator.name: RuleLearner
operator.description: Learns a pruned set of rules with respect to the information gain.

operator.name: OneR
operator.description: Learns a single rule using only one attribute.

operator.name: BasicRuleLearner
operator.description: Learns a set of rules minimizing the training error without pruning.

operator.name: Tree2RuleConverter
operator.description: Determines a set of rules from a given decision tree model.

operator.name: MultiwayDecisionTree
operator.description: Uses the split points of numerical attributes to first discretize attributes and then perform the tree building again.

operator.name: FPGrowth
operator.description: This learner efficiently calculates all frequent item sets from the given data.

operator.name: AssociationRuleGenerator
operator.description: This operator generated a set of association rules for a given set of frequent item sets.

operator.name: KMedoids
operator.description: Clustering with k-medoids

operator.name: KMeans
operator.description: Clustering with k-means

operator.name: EMClustering
operator.description: Clustering with EM

operator.name: KernelKMeans
operator.description: Clustering with kernel k-means

operator.name: SupportVectorClustering
operator.description: Clustering with support vectors

operator.name: AgglomerativeClustering
operator.description: Agglomerative buttom-up clustering

operator.name: TopDownClustering
operator.description: Hierarchical clustering by applying an inner flat clusterer scheme recursively

operator.name: DBScanClustering
operator.description: Clustering with DBSCAN

operator.name: RandomFlatClustering
operator.description: Flat random clustering

operator.name: ExampleSet2ClusterModel
operator.description: Clustering based on one nominal attribute.

operator.name: FlattenClusterModel
operator.description: Creates a flat cluster model from a hierarchical one.

operator.name: ClusterModel2ExampleSet
operator.description: Labels an example set with the cluster ids from a given non hierarchical cluster model.

operator.name: Cluster2Prediction
operator.description: This operator converts the cluster attribute into an prediction attribut, choosing the best fitting pairs between cluster and label.

operator.name: ExampleSet2Similarity
operator.description: Calculates a similarity measure from the given data (attribute based).

operator.name: ExampleSet2SimilarityExampleSet
operator.description: Calculates between all given examples.

operator.name: Similarity2ExampleSet
operator.description: Calculates a an example set from a similarity measure.

operator.name: IdTagging
operator.description: Adds a new id attribute to the example set, each example is tagged with an incremented number.

operator.name: AttributeSubsetPreprocessing
operator.description: Selects one attribute (or a subset) via a regular expression and applies its inner operators to the resulting subset.

operator.name: AbsoluteValues
operator.description: Replaces all numerical values by their absolute values.

operator.name: AttributeWeightsApplier
operator.description: Deselects attributes with weight 0 and calculates new values for numeric attributes.

operator.name: PrincipalComponentsGenerator
operator.description: Build the principal components of the given data.

operator.name: FrequentItemSetAttributeCreator
operator.description: Creates attributes from frequent item sets.

operator.name: AttributeMerge
operator.description: Merges two attributes into a single new attribute by concatenating the values.

operator.name: ChangeAttributeName
operator.description: This operator can be used to rename an attribute.

operator.name: ChangeAttributeNamesReplace
operator.description: This operator can be used to rename a set of attributes by replacing parts of the attribute names by a specified replacement.

operator.name: ChangeAttributeNames2Generic
operator.description: This operator can be used to rename all attributes of the input example set to a set of generic names like att1, att2, att3 etc.

operator.name: Construction2Names
operator.description: This operator renames all regular attributes by their construction descriptions if available.

operator.name: ChangeAttributeType
operator.description: This operator can be used to change the attribute type (regular, special, label, id...).
operator.deprecation: Please use the operator ChangeAttributeRole instead

operator.name: ChangeAttributeRole
operator.description: This operator can be used to change the attribute type (regular, special, label, id...).

operator.name: ExchangeAttributeRoles
operator.description: This operator can be used to exchange the attribute roles of two attributes (e.g. a label with a regular attribute).

operator.name: AttributeWeightSelection
operator.description: Selects only attributes which weights fulfill a given relation with respect to the input attribute weights.

operator.name: BruteForce
operator.description: Selects the best features for an example set by trying all possible combinations of attribute selections.

operator.name: FeatureSelection
operator.description: This operator realizes feature selection by forward selection and backward elimination, respectively.

operator.name: RandomSelection
operator.description: This operator simply selects a random or a predefined number of random features.

operator.name: GeneticAlgorithm
operator.description: A genetic algorithm for feature selection.

operator.name: WeightGuidedFeatureSelection
operator.description: Adds iteratively features according to input attribute weights

operator.name: WeightOptimization
operator.description: Feature selection (forward, backward) guided by weights.

operator.name: IterativeWeightOptimization
operator.description: Feature selection (forward, backward) guided by weights. Weights have to be updated after each iteration

operator.name: GeneratingGeneticAlgorithm
operator.description: A genetic algorithm for feature selection and feature generation (GGA).

operator.name: AGA
operator.description: Another (improved) genetic algorithm for feature selection and feature generation (AGA).

operator.name: YAGGA
operator.description: Yet Another GGA (Generating Geneting Algorithm). On average individuals (= selected attribute sets) will keep their original length, unless longer or shorther ones prove to have a better fitness.

operator.name: YAGGA2
operator.description: Improved version of Yet Another GGA (Generating Geneting Algorithm).

operator.name: EvolutionaryFeatureAggregation
operator.description: A generating genetic algorithm for unsupervised learning (experimental).

operator.name: NameBasedWeighting
operator.description: This operator defines the weights for all features based on a list of regular expressions for the feature names which can be used to set a specified weight to features with a name fulfilling these expressions.

operator.name: SingleRuleWeighting
operator.description: This operator measures the relevance of features by constructing a single rule for each attribute and calculating the errors.

operator.name: Relief
operator.description: Relief measures the relevance of features by sampling examples and comparing the value of the current feature for the nearest example of the same and of a different class.

operator.name: ChiSquaredWeighting
operator.description: This operator calculates the relevance of a feature by computing for each attribute of the input example set the value of the chi-squared statistic with respect to the class attribute.

operator.name: SymmetricalUncertaintyWeighting
operator.description: This operator calculates the relevance of an attribute by measuring the symmetrical uncertainty with respect to the class.

operator.name: ExampleSet2AttributeWeights
operator.description: This operator simply creates new attribute weights of 1 for each input attribute.

operator.name: AttributeWeights2ExampleSet
operator.description: This operator simply creates a new data set where for each attribute the corresponding weight is stored.

operator.name: ProcessLog2AttributeWeights
operator.description: This operator creates new attribute weights from a attribute names column logged with the ProcessLog operator.

operator.name: InfoGainWeighting
operator.description: This operator calculates the relevance of the attributes based on the information gain.

operator.name: InfoGainRatioWeighting
operator.description: This operator calculates the relevance of the attributes based on the information gain ratio.

operator.name: CorrelationBasedWeighting
operator.description: Performs an example weighting based upon the residuals of an unweighted local polynomial regression.

operator.name: GiniIndexWeighting
operator.description: This operator calculates the relevance of the attributes based on the Gini impurity index.

operator.name: SVMWeighting
operator.description: This operator uses the coefficients of a hyperplance calculated by an SVM as feature weights.

operator.name: PCAWeighting
operator.description: This operator uses the factors of a PCA component (usually the first) as feature weights.

operator.name: CorpusBasedWeighting
operator.description: This operator uses a corpus of examples to characterize a single class by setting feature weights.

operator.name: ForwardWeighting
operator.description: Assumes that features are independent and optimizes the weights of the attributes with a linear search.

operator.name: BackwardWeighting
operator.description: Assumes that features are independent and optimizes the weights of the attributes with a linear search.

operator.name: EvolutionaryWeighting
operator.description: Weight the features with an evolutionary approach.

operator.name: PSOWeighting
operator.description: Weight the features with a particle swarm optimization approach.

operator.name: InteractiveAttributeWeighting
operator.description: Shows a window with feature weights and allows users to change them.

operator.name: StandardDeviationWeighting
operator.description: Computes weights based on the (normalized) standard deviation of the attributes.

operator.name: Attributes2RealValues
operator.description: Maps all values to real values.
operator.deprecation: Please use the operator 'Nominal2Numerical' or 'Numerical2Real' instead

operator.name: NominalNumbers2Numerical
operator.description: Maps all nominal values to numerical values by parsing the numbers if possible.

operator.name: GuessValueTypes
operator.description: (Re-)guesses all value types and changes them accordingly.

operator.name: Nominal2String
operator.description: Replaces all nominal attributes by corresponding string attributes.

operator.name: String2Nominal
operator.description: Replaces all string attributes by corresponding nominal attributes.

operator.name: Numerical2Real
operator.description: Replaces all numerical attributes (especially integer attributes) by corresponding real valued attributes.

operator.name: Real2Integer
operator.description: Replaces all real-valued attributes by corresponding integer attributes (rounded or cutted).

operator.name: Nominal2Date
operator.description: Parses the nominal values for the specified attribute with respect to the given date format string and transforms the values into date values.

operator.name: Date2Nominal
operator.description: Parses the date values for the specified date attribute with respect to the given date format string and transforms the values into nominal values.

operator.name: Date2Numerical
operator.description: Transforms date values into numerical ones capturing the milliseconds since 01/01/1970 00:00:00 GMT.

operator.name: Nominal2Numeric
operator.description: Maps all values to real values (usually simply using the internal indices).

operator.name: Nominal2Numerical
operator.description: Maps all values to real values (usually simply using the internal indices).

operator.name: Numeric2Binary
operator.description: Maps all numeric values to 'false' if they are in the specified range (typical: equal 0.0) and to 'true' otherwise.

operator.name: Numeric2Binominal
operator.description: Maps all numeric values to 'false' if they are in the specified range (typical: equal 0.0) and to 'true' otherwise.

operator.name: Numerical2Binominal
operator.description: Maps all numeric values to 'false' if they are in the specified range (typical: equal 0.0) and to 'true' otherwise.

operator.name: Numeric2Polynominal
operator.description: Maps all numeric values simply to the corresponding nominal values. Please use one of the discretization operators if you need more sophisticated nominalization methods.

operator.name: Numerical2Polynominal
operator.description: Maps all numeric values simply to the corresponding nominal values. Please use one of the discretization operators if you need more sophisticated nominalization methods.

operator.name: Numerical2FormattedNominal
operator.description: Reformats all numerical attributes according to the specified settings and change the attributes to nominal.

operator.name: AttributeValueMapper
operator.description: Maps certain values of an attribute to other values.

operator.name: Mapping
operator.description: Maps certain values of an attribute to other values.

operator.name: InternalBinominalRemapping
operator.description: Corrects the internal value mapping of binominal attributes according to the specified negative and positive values.

operator.name: AttributeValueSubstring
operator.description: Creates new attributes from nominal attributes which only contain substrings of the original attributes.

operator.name: Substring
operator.description: Creates new attributes from nominal attributes which only contain substrings of the original attributes.

operator.name: Trim
operator.description: Creates new attributes from nominal attributes which contain the trimmed original values.

operator.name: Replace
operator.description: Creates new attributes from nominal attributes with replaced substrings.

operator.name: Dictionary
operator.description: Replaces occurrances in nominal attributes specified by a second input example set.

operator.name: Split
operator.description: Creates new attributes from a nominal attribute by dividing the nominal values into parts according to a split criterion.

operator.name: AddNominalValue
operator.description: This operator adds an additional value to a specified nominal attribute which is then mapped to a specific index.

operator.name: AddValue
operator.description: This operator adds an additional value to a specified nominal attribute which is then mapped to a specific index.

operator.name: MergeNominalValues
operator.description: Merges two nominal values of a specified attribute.

operator.name: MergeValues
operator.description: Merges two nominal values of a specified attribute.

operator.name: AttributeAdd
operator.description: Adds a new attribute to the data set with the given name and type.

operator.name: AttributeCopy
operator.description: Copies a single attribute (only the view on the data column, not the data itself).

operator.name: BinDiscretization
operator.description: Discretize numerical attributes into a user defined number of bins.

operator.name: MinMaxBinDiscretization
operator.description: Discretize numerical attributes into a user defined number of bins lying in a user defined value range.

operator.name: UserBasedDiscretization
operator.description: Discretize numerical attributes into user defined bins.

operator.name: FrequencyDiscretization
operator.description: Discretize numerical attributes into a user defined number of bins with equal frequency.

operator.name: AbsoluteDiscretization
operator.description: Discretize numerical attributes into bins with user defined number of contained examples.

operator.name: MinimalEntropyPartitioning
operator.description: Discretizes numerical attributes. Bin boundaries are chosen as to minimize the entropy in the induced partitions.

operator.name: ExampleFilter
operator.description: This operator only allows examples which fulfill a specified condition.

operator.name: AttributeFilter
operator.description: This operator removes attributes which fulfill a specified condition.

operator.name: SetData
operator.description: Sets the data of a specified example and attribute to the specified value.

operator.name: DateAdjust
operator.description: Adjusts the date in a specified column by adding or subtracting the specified amount of time.

operator.name: RemoveDuplicates
operator.description: Removes those examples from the given example set which are duplicates to others based on the given attribute specification.

operator.name: TFIDFFilter
operator.description: Performs a TF-IDF filtering to the input data set.

operator.name: Sorting
operator.description: This operator sorts the given example set according to a single attribute.

operator.name: NonDominatedSorting
operator.description: This operator sorts the given example set according a set of attributes such that dominated examples will be sorted after non-dominated examples.

operator.name: ExampleRangeFilter
operator.description: This only allows examples in the specified index range.

operator.name: Permutation
operator.description: Permutates the examples in the table. Caution: will increase memory usage!

operator.name: FeatureGeneration
operator.description: The feature generation operator generates new user defined features.

operator.name: AttributeConstruction
operator.description: This operator constructs new user defined attributes from mathematical expressions.

operator.name: ConditionedFeatureGeneration
operator.description: The conditioned feature generation operator allows to generate features with values dependent on conditions.
This operator constructs a new attribute by aggregating values of other attributes in every example.

operator.name: GaussAttributeGeneration
operator.description: Creates a gaussian function based on a given attribute and a specified mean and standard deviation sigma.

operator.name: ProductAttributeGeneration
operator.description: Creates all products based on the attributes specified by regular expressions.

operator.name: LinearCombination
operator.description: This operator created a new example set containing only one feature: the linear combination of all input attributes.

operator.name: CompleteFeatureGeneration
operator.description: The feature generation operator generates new features via applying a set of functions on all features.

operator.name: FourierTransform
operator.description: Uses the label as function of each attribute and calculates the fourier transformations as new attributes.

operator.name: FeatureValueTypeFilter
operator.description: This operator switches off those features whose value type matches the given one.

operator.name: FeatureBlockTypeFilter
operator.description: This operator switches off those features whose block type matches the given one.

operator.name: FeatureNameFilter
operator.description: This operator switches off those features whose name matches the given one (regular expressions are also allowed).

operator.name: FeatureRangeRemoval
operator.description: This operator removes a range of features.

operator.name: InfiniteValueReplenishment
operator.description: Replaces infinite values in examples.

operator.name: Partition
operator.description: Partitions an example set into subsets according to the specified relative sizes.

operator.name: Sampling
operator.description: Creates a sample from an example set by drawing a fraction.

operator.name: KennardStoneSampling
operator.description: Creates a sample from an example set using the Kennard-Stone algorithm.

operator.name: Bootstrapping
operator.description: Creates a bootstrapped sample by sampling with replacement.

operator.name: WeightedBootstrapping
operator.description: Creates a bootstrapped sample by weighted sampling with replacement.

operator.name: AbsoluteSampling
operator.description: Creates a sample from an example set by drawing an exact number of examples.

operator.name: StratifiedSampling
operator.description: Creates a stratified sample from an example set by drawing a fraction.

operator.name: AbsoluteStratifiedSampling
operator.description: Creates a stratified sample from an example set by drawing a given number of examples.

operator.name: ModelBasedSampling
operator.description: Creates a sample from an example set. The sampling is based on a model and is constructed to focus on examples not yet explained.

operator.name: MissingValueReplenishment
operator.description: Replaces missing values in examples.

operator.name: MissingValueReplenishmentView
operator.description: Replaces missing values in examples. In contrast to the usual missing value replenishment, this operator does not change the underlying data but replaces the missing values on the fly by using a new view on the data.

operator.name: MissingValueImputation
operator.description: Replaces missing values in examples by applying a model learned for missing values.

operator.name: EqualLabelWeighting
operator.description: Distributes weight over examples, so that per label weights sum up equally.

operator.name: Normalization
operator.description: Normalizes the attribute values for a specified range.

operator.name: Nominal2Binary
operator.description: Maps all nominal values to binary attributes.

operator.name: Nominal2Binominal
operator.description: Maps all nominal values to binominal (binary) attributes.

operator.name: RemoveUselessAttributes
operator.description: Remove all useless attributes from an example set.

operator.name: NoiseGenerator
operator.description: Adds noise to existing attributes or add random attributes.

operator.name: Obfuscator
operator.description: Replaces all nominal values and attribute names by random strings.

operator.name: DeObfuscator
operator.description: Replaces all obfuscated values and attribute names by the ones given in a file.

operator.name: ExampleSetJoin
operator.description: Build the join of two example sets using the id attributes of the sets in order to identify the same examples.

operator.name: ExampleSetSuperset
operator.description: This operator gets two example sets and adds new features to each of both example sets so that both example sets consist of the same set of features.

operator.name: ExampleSetUnion
operator.description: This operator first builds the union set / superset for both input example sets and merges both extended sets into a new one.

operator.name: ExampleSetMinus
operator.description: This operator returns these examples of an example set whose IDs are not contained within another example set.

operator.name: ExampleSetIntersect
operator.description: This operator returns these examples of an example set whose IDs are contained within another example set.

operator.name: ExampleSetCartesian
operator.description: Build the cartesian product of two example sets. In contrast to the ExampleSetJoin operator Id attributes are not needes.

operator.name: ExampleSetMerge
operator.description: Build a merged example set from two or more compatible example sets by adding all examples into a combined set.

operator.name: ExampleSetTranspose
operator.description: Transposes the input example set similar to the matrix operator transpose.

operator.name: UseRowAsAttributeNames
operator.description: Uses the specified row as new attibute names and deletes the row from the data set.

operator.name: PCA
operator.description: Performs a principal component analysis (PCA) using the covariance matrix.

operator.name: KernelPCA
operator.description: Performs a kernel principal component analysis (PCA).

operator.name: SVDReduction
operator.description: Performs a dimensionality reduction based on Singular Value Decomposition (SVD).

operator.name: SOMDimensionalityReduction
operator.description: Trains a self-organizing map and applyes the examples on the map. The resulting coordinates are used as new attributes.

operator.name: GHA
operator.description: Generalized Hebbian Algorithm (GHA). Performs an iterative principal components analysis.

operator.name: FastICA
operator.description: Performs an independent component analysis (ICA).

operator.name: ComponentWeights
operator.description: Creates the AttributeWeights of models containing components like PCA, GHA or FastICA.

operator.name: RemoveCorrelatedFeatures
operator.description: Removes correlated features.

operator.name: DensityBasedOutlierDetection
operator.description: Identifies outliers in the given ExampleSet based on the data density.

operator.name: LOFOutlierDetection
operator.description: Identifies outliers in the given ExampleSet based on local outlier factors.

operator.name: DistanceBasedOutlierDetection
operator.description: Identifies n outliers in the given ExampleSet based on the distance to their k nearest neighbors.

operator.name: FrequentItemSetUnificator
operator.description: Compares sets of frequent item sets and removes common not unique sets.

operator.name: PlattScaling
operator.description: Turns confidence scores of boolean classifiers into probability estimates.

operator.name: ThresholdFinder
operator.description: Finds a threshold for given prediction confidences (soft predictions) , costs and distributional information in order to turn it into a crisp classification. The optimization step is based on ROC analysis.

operator.name: ThresholdCreator
operator.description: Creates a user defined threshold for given prediction confidences (soft predictions) in order to turn it into a crisp classifier.

operator.name: ThresholdApplier
operator.description: Applies a threshold on soft classified data.

operator.name: UncertainPredictionsTransformation
operator.description: Sets all predictions to 'unknown' (missing value) if the corresponding confidence is smaller than the specified value.

operator.name: WindowExamples2OriginalData
operator.description: Transform a data set transformed with a multivariate windowing followed by a WindowExamples2ModelingData operator into a data set where both the label and the predicted label (if applicable, i.e. after a ModelApplier) are transformed into their original data ranges by adding the values of the base value attribute.

operator.name: ProcessEmbedder
operator.description: This operator embeds a complete process previously written into a file.

operator.name: ExperimentEmbedder
operator.description: This operator embeds a complete experiment previously written into a file.
operator.deprecation: Please use the operator 'ProcessEmbedder' instead (and note the change of the parameter name!)

operator.name: DirectoryIterator
operator.description: This operator iterates over all files in a directory and delivers their paths and names as macro to the inner operators.

operator.name: FileIterator
operator.description: This operator iterates over all files in a directory and delivers their paths and names as macro to the inner operators.

operator.name: BatchProcessing
operator.description: Creates batches from the input examples and performs its inner operators on each of these batches which might be useful for applying methods on very large data sets directly in databases.

operator.name: SplitChain
operator.description: Splits an example set in two parts based on a user defined ratio and uses the output of the first child and the second part as input for the second child.

operator.name: AbsoluteSplitChain
operator.description: Splits an example set in two parts based on user defined set sizes and uses the output of the first child and the second part as input for the second child.

operator.name: OperatorEnabler
operator.description: This operator can be used to automatically enable or disable inner operators.

operator.name: OperatorSelector
operator.description: This operator can be used to select a single inner operator which should be performed, e.g. by means of parameter iteration or optimization operators.

operator.name: ProcessBranch
operator.description: This operator provides a conditional execution of operators.

operator.name: ErrorNeglector
operator.description: This operator performs the inner operator and neglects any errors. In this case, no inner output will be returned.

operator.name: ExceptionHandling
operator.description: This operator performs the inner operator and neglects any errors. In this case, no inner output will be returned.

operator.name: LearningCurve
operator.description: Iterates its inner operator for an increasing number of samples and collects the performances.

operator.name: PartialExampleSetLearner
operator.description: Uses only a fraction of the data to apply the inner operator on it.

operator.name: ExampleSetIterator
operator.description: Performs its inner operators for each example set found in input.

operator.name: MultipleLabelIterator
operator.description: Performs its inner operators for each label found in input example set.

operator.name: RepeatUntilOperatorChain
operator.description: Performs its inner operators until some condition is met.

operator.name: IteratingOperatorChain
operator.description: Performs its inner operators k times.

operator.name: FeatureSubsetIteration
operator.description: Performs its inner operator for all specified feature subsets (useful for brute force evaluations in combination with the ProcessLog operator).

operator.name: FeatureIterator
operator.description: Iterates over the given features and applies the inner operators for each feature where the inner operators can access the current feature name by a macro.

operator.name: ValueSubgroupIterator
operator.description: Iterates over the values of the specified attributes and applies the inner operators on the subgroups which exhibit the current attribute value.

operator.name: ValueIterator
operator.description: Iterates over the values of the specified attributes and applies the inner operators on the input example set while the current value can be accessed via a macro. In contrast to the ValueSubgroupIterator operator the inner operators are applied on the complete example set.

operator.name: RandomOptimizer
operator.description: Performs its inner operators k times and returns the best results.

operator.name: ParameterSetter
operator.description: Applies a set of parameters. Operator names may be remapped.

operator.name: ParameterCloner
operator.description: Applies a set of parameters of a source operator on a target operator.

operator.name: GridParameterOptimization
operator.description: This operator finds the optimal values for parameters.

operator.name: QuadraticParameterOptimization
operator.description: This operator finds the optimal values for parameters using a quadratic interaction model.

operator.name: EvolutionaryParameterOptimization
operator.description: This operator finds the optimal values for parameters using an evolutionary computation approach.

operator.name: ParameterIteration
operator.description: This operator just iterates through all defined parameter combinations.

operator.name: AverageBuilder
operator.description: Builds the average of input average vectors (e.g. performance) of the same type.

operator.name: XVPrediction
operator.description: Predicts the examples in a cross-validation-like fashion.

operator.name: ClusterIteration
operator.description: Applies all inner operators to all clusters.

operator.name: SeriesPrediction
operator.description: Creates predictions for an ordered time series given as the label attribute of an example set.

operator.name: ProcessLog
operator.description: Saves almost arbitrary data to a log table (also possibly in a file) and create statistics for online plotting of values/parameters provided by operators.

operator.name: ClearProcessLog
operator.description: Clears a table generated by a ProcessLog operator.

operator.name: ExperimentLog
operator.description: Saves almost arbitrary data to a log file and create statistics for online plotting of values/parameters provided by operators.

operator.name: ProcessLog2ExampleSet
operator.description: Transforms the data generated by the ProcessLog operator into an example set which can be used by other operators.

operator.name: Data2Log
operator.description: Reads the specified value from the input example set and provides the value for logging purposes.

operator.name: Macro2Log
operator.description: Reads the value from the specified macro and provides the value for logging purposes.

operator.name: ExampleVisualizer
operator.description: Allows the visualization of examples (attribute values) in the plot view of an example set (double click on data point).

operator.name: DatabaseExampleVisualizer
operator.description: Allows the visualization of examples (attribute values) in the plot view of an example set (double click on data point). The data is directly derived from the specified database table.

operator.name: DataStatistics
operator.description: Calculates some simple data statistics usually displayed by the GUI (only necessary for command line processes).

operator.name: ANOVAMatrix
operator.description: Performs an ANOVA significance test for a all numerical attribute based on the groups defined by all other nominal attributes.

operator.name: CorrelationMatrix
operator.description: Determines the correlation between all attributes and can produce a weight vector based on correlations.

operator.name: CovarianceMatrix
operator.description: Determines the covariance between all attributes.

operator.name: TransitionMatrix
operator.description: Determines the transition probabilities of nominal values.

operator.name: TransitionGraph
operator.description: Creates a graphical representation of transitions defined by source and target attributes.

operator.name: MutualInformationMatrix
operator.description: Determines the mutual information between all attributes.

operator.name: RainflowMatrix
operator.description: Determines the rainflow matrix for a specified attribute.

operator.name: LiftChart
operator.description: Generates a lift chart for the given binominal model and input data set.

operator.name: LiftParetoChart
operator.description: Generates a lift chart for the given model and input data set based on discretized confidences and a Pareto chart.

operator.name: ROCChart
operator.description: Generates a ROC chart for the given binominal model and input data set.

operator.name: ROCComparator
operator.description: Generates a ROC chart for the models created by each of the inner learners and plot all charts in the same plotter.

operator.name: ModelVisualizer
operator.description: Generates a SOM plot (transforming arbitrary number of dimensions to two) of the given data set and colorizes the landscape with the predictions of the given model.

operator.name: FormulaExtractor
operator.description: Generates a formula from a given model for models which are capable of producing formulas.

operator.name: GroupedANOVA
operator.description: Performs an ANOVA significance test for a single numerical attribute based on the groups defined by another (nominal) attribute.

operator.name: Aggregation
operator.description: Performs one of the aggregation functions (count, sum...) known from SQL (allows also grouping).

operator.name: Example2AttributePivoting
operator.description: Transforms an example set by grouping multiple examples of single units to single examples.

operator.name: Attribute2ExamplePivoting
operator.description: Transforms an example set by dividing examples containing multiple observations (in attributes) into multiple examples.

operator.name: GroupBy
operator.description: Partitions an example set according to the values of a single nominal or integer attributes.

operator.name: ExampleSetGenerator
operator.description: Generates an example set based on numerical attributes.

operator.name: NominalExampleSetGenerator
operator.description: Generates an example set based on nominal attributes.

operator.name: MassiveDataGenerator
operator.description: Generates huge amounts of data for testing purposes.

operator.name: DirectMailingExampleSetGenerator
operator.description: Generates data for testing purposes based on a direct mailing data set.

operator.name: UpSellingExampleSetGenerator
operator.description: Generates data for testing purposes based on an up-selling data set.

operator.name: ChurnReductionExampleSetGenerator
operator.description: Generates data for testing purposes based on a churn reduction data set.

operator.name: TeamProfitExampleSetGenerator
operator.description: Generates data for testing purposes based on a team profit data set.

operator.name: SalesExampleSetGenerator
operator.description: Generates data for testing purposes based on a sales data set.

operator.name: TransfersExampleSetGenerator
operator.description: Generates data for testing purposes based on a transfers data set.

operator.name: MultipleLabelGenerator
operator.description: Generates an example set based on numerical attributes and with more than one label.

operator.name: Single2Series
operator.description: Changes the value type of all single valued attributes and forms a value series from all attributes.

operator.name: Series2WindowExamples
operator.description: Creates examples from an univariate value series data by windowing and using a label value with respect to a user defined prediction horizon.

operator.name: MultivariateSeries2WindowExamples
operator.description: Creates examples from a multivariate value series data set by windowing the input data.

operator.name: FillDataGaps
operator.description: This operator fills gaps in the data based on the ID attribute of the data set.

operator.name: WindowExamples2ModelingData
operator.description: Transform the result of a multivariate windowing into a data set which can be used for training / model application by removing all attributes in the horizon, defining the label, transforming the data into a relative format.

operator.name: LabelTrend2Classification
operator.description: This operator iterates over an example set with numeric label and converts the label values to either the class 'up' or the class 'down' based on whether the change from the previous label is positive or negative.

operator.name: LagSeries
operator.description: Lags a specified series.

operator.name: DifferentiateSeries
operator.description: Extracts changes between subsequent series values.

operator.name: CumulateSeries
operator.description: Generates the cumulative sum series.

operator.name: IndexSeries
operator.description: Calculates an index series from an origional series.

operator.name: MovingAverage
operator.description: Generates a new attribute containing the moving average series of a series attribute.

operator.name: ExponentialSmoothing
operator.description: Generates a new attribute which smoothes a given attribute.

operator.name: Trend
operator.description: Adds a trend for an attribute which is generated by an inner regression lerner.

operator.name: SeriesMissingValueReplenishment
operator.description: Replaces missing value in a time series attribute.

operator.name: EnsureMonotonicty
operator.description: Ensures that all values of a specified attribute are monotonically increasing.

operator.name: TextObjectWriter
operator.description: Writes a textobject into a file.

operator.name: TextObjectLoader
operator.description: Loads a textobject from file.

operator.name: TextExtractor
operator.description: Extracts the text of a textobject that matchs a given regular expression and returns it.

operator.name: SingleTextObjectInput
operator.description: Generates a textObject a single text.

operator.name: TextCleaner
operator.description: Removes parts of the text matching a given regular expression.

operator.name: TextObject2ExampleSet
operator.description: Generates an exampleSet containing the text as nominal attribute value.

operator.name: TextSegmenter
operator.description: Splits a Input TextObject into segments using regular expressions specifiying start and end of segments.
